about_the_game:
Abducted and forced to perform in a galactic trial of skill, can you master the challenges and return home?



Introducing Patti Hattu! Cosmic Revolt. Get ready to embark on an intergalactic adventure! This electrifying ball-rolling arcade racer is a thrilling fusion of puzzle-solving, platforming, racing, and parkour-inspired action!

With lightning-fast gameplay and intuitive controls, Patti Hattu! Cosmic Revolt will have you on the edge of your seat from the moment you hit play. Addictive "just one more try" gameplay makes it perfect for both casual gamers and seasoned pros alike.



Delve into a world of finely-tuned physics and thoughtfully designed levels. Master the in-game abilities and you'll effortlessly unleash spectacular stunts and add layers of depth to your gameplay.



Enter The Trials and uncover a world of hidden treasures and clandestine shortcuts, meticulously designed to elevate your gameplay to legendary status! Discover the thrill of unearthing secret items and pathways that promise to skyrocket your ratings to the top!

With mysteries waiting to be unraveled, igniting your imagination and sparking the question, "What if I dared to try this?" The journey to greatness begins now—will you seize the opportunity?

Introducing Patti Hattu! Cosmic Revolt. Get ready to embark on an intergalactic adventure! This electrifying ball-rolling arcade racer is a thrilling fusion of puzzle-solving, platforming, racing, and parkour-inspired action!

With lightning-fast gameplay and intuitive controls, Patti Hattu! Cosmic Revolt will have you on the edge of your seat from the moment you hit play. Addictive "just one more try" gameplay makes it perfect for both casual gamers and seasoned pros alike.



Delve into a world of finely-tuned physics and thoughtfully designed levels. Master the in-game abilities and you'll effortlessly unleash spectacular stunts and add layers of depth to your gameplay.



Enter The Trials and uncover a world of hidden treasures and clandestine shortcuts, meticulously designed to elevate your gameplay to legendary status! Discover the thrill of unearthing secret items and pathways that promise to skyrocket your ratings to the top!

With mysteries waiting to be unraveled, igniting your imagination and sparking the question, "What if I dared to try this?" The journey to greatness begins now—will you seize the opportunity?
name: Marble Abduction! Patti Hattu Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or AMD R9 290X series card or higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Abducted and forced to perform in a galactic trial of skill, can you master the challenges and return home?
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
